is lake in the west-south, 16km from Xinyu. The district is around 200 square km, with 50 square km water area. There are over 200 small islands distributed in the lake. Yacht can take you visit 10 of them in 2 hours' ride.

in the North Lake Road in the sunset. It's an avenue surrounded by nice trees in the upper class resident area. Starting from the dusk, local people all come out walking, chatting in their very relaxing dress, enjoying the shadowed road and glass slopes in the North Lake Park.
